content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. I understand you need help with HVAC. Could you please provide your name to get started?
Thanks Mike. Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability and schedule the appointment?
Great, Mike. You're within our service area. When would be an ideal time for our technician to come by and check your HVAC system?
I think I'll try to fix it myself first and see if that works. Thanks anyway.
reason: Customer decided to try fixing the problem themselves.
